Questions.A1: Item is a subclass of Rect that allows Items to be defined as children.
Questions.A2: the Qml extension of a QObject.
Questions.A3: Item contains the attributes that are common across visual items, such as x and y position, width and height, anchoring and key handling support.
Questions.A4: Item is a small base class allowing parent-child relationships to be created.
Questions.Q: What are the features of Qml Item?
